description: Won fifth place in last year's Coney Island Banana Eating contest with a personal best of 25 bananas.
name: Monkey

description: An alphabet soup of letters, numbers, symbols, and emoji.
name: Text

description: An adept problem solver and inventor, loves to juggle and garden.
name: Octopus

description: Coloring is due to an accidental swim in a vat of grape soda.
name: Gorilla

description: Originally baked in a bakery in San Diego. Used to date Mr. Mustache.
name: Cupcake

description: Was a backup dancer for Michael Jackson back in the day, now teaches fitness classes.
name: Bear

description: Went to school with Mosquito but graduated a year early. Has tested 38 different recipes for key lime pie, but still isn't satisfied.
name: Dino

description: Three-time double dutch champion currently working on a memoir.
name: Frog

description: Gets his pants custom tailored at a shop in New York City's West Village.
name: Jody

description: Used magic to escape the Illuminati a couple years ago. Used to date Cupcake.
name: Mr. Mustache

description: Comes from a family of space probes but just wants to make art and chill.
name: Space Pod

description: Thinks that the best dessert is human brains with strawberry sauce.
name: Zombear

description: Beware when giving him treats. His favorite trick is to leave a stink bomb on your porch and then innocently float away.
name: Ghoulopus

description: Are a quite jolly lot. They enjoy flying around together and spooking late-night pedestrians.
name: Bats

description: He looks big, green, and scary but has a good and kind heart.
name: Frankenrilla

description: Likes to pretend to be evil, but in reality, when it gets dark Jody, Pumpkin and Lantern organize a disco and dance until dawn.
name: Witch Jody

description: Got sick from all the bitter herbs that magicians used to feed him. He asked Witch Jody to enchant him so now he spits out only the sweets.
name: Cauldron

description: Pretends to be a decoration on the porch then jumps out and laughs loudly to startle trick-or-treaters.
name: Pumpkin

description: Witch Jody’s best friend, he likes to take her and the kids on rides when the moon is full.
name: Broom

description: Charismatic but secretly afraid of public speaking.
name: Parrot

description: Dabbled in CrossFit before finding a career as a makeup artist.
name: Mandrill

description: Half the size of the human characters because she is prehistoric. She was excavated from amber in 1993.
name: Mosquito

description: Started her venture, a tree farm, at age 12. Proceeded to dominate the business world with her entrepreneurial skills.
name: Miss Chief

description: Once mistook Frog for an insect and tried to eat him. It was awkward.
name: Venus

description: Loves all video games, except for the racing ones.
name: Jeepers

description: Claim to fame: Alexander the Great and his army once camped under its branches. Loves throwing shade.
name: Banyan

description: Was a pop star in Europe but stopped touring so she could build worlds in Hopscotch.
name: Star Girl

description: Once fist bumped a shark on a deep sea dive.
name: Cosmic Cody

description: From the Yukon. Her wheeled snowboard is the only one of its kind, able to ride on both snow and land.
name: Chillanna

description: Built by Chillanna over the course of six months. Totally bewildered by human emotions, but hoping that AI will provide some insights.
name: Robo

description: Meticulous about grooming and personal hygiene. Does not like mornings.
name: Raccoon

description: Used to front a metal band but singing damaged her vocal chords, now runs a profitable pottery business.
name: Bird

description: A retired ballet dancer studying to become a Pilates instructor.
name: Toucan

description: A bookworm, enjoys spending time reading alone. Does not like surprises.
name: Anteater

description: A naturally skilled swimmer capable of being an Olympian if it didn't take 20 hour naps.
name: Sloth

description: Favorite dessert: shave ice. Favorite flavor: li hing mui.
name: Iguana

description: The official hangout spot for all the jungle creatures. Wants to be a yurt when it grows up.
name: Hut

description: In town to rescue his friends from the central park zoo.
name: Penguin

description: Her queendom had melted into the ocean by late 2010, but she reappears every winter to mourn her lost land.
name: Queen Ana

description: Does she really exist? Why is she blushing? These are the mysteries surrounding the Yeti, we can't solve them for you.
name: Yeti

description: Stronger than eight normal deer and can easily pull his friends on the sleigh. Even the Yeti.
name: Reindeer

description: Normal-sized for a human, but he's the Yao Ming of elves.
name: Elf

description: When you enter the snow globe you travel to a new dimension from which there is no escape. Be cautious as you approach.
name: Snow Globe

description: Had never met a penguin until this most recent trip to New York City. Now they're best friends.
name: Polar Bear

description: Strong and sturdy, this is a great way for Hopscotchers to get around.
name: Sleigh

description: Her alterego, Lil' Miss Toe, has had three singles on Hot 97's top 20 in the last 6 months
name: Mistle

description: Some kids made him last time it snowed on the Mayan Riviera. He's still waiting for the temperatures to drop so he can return.
name: Gonzalo

description: In the wild, no two are alike. In Hopscotch, they're all identical.
name: Snowflake

description: Combine me with text to make a nice friendly button.
name: Rounded Square

description: Caring and compassionate, offers support to others in need.
name: Square

description: Bubbly and talkative, frequently goes off on tangents.
name: Circle

description: Less rigid than its equilateral sibling but believes in the importance of balance.
name: Right Triangle

description: The leaning tower of Pisa has nothing on the Hopscotch tilted rectangle.
name: Tilted Rectangle

description: Sweet and friendly, best friends with frosting and powdered sugar.
name: Donut

description: Responsible and serious, always finishes work a day before it's due.
name: Corner

description: The life of the party, adds a little color to any occasion.
name: Flower

description: Awkward with strangers but loves to karaoke with friends.
name: Squished Box

description: A softer, kinder, building block for your project.
name: Rounded Right Triangle

description: It marks the spot.
name: X

description: Lazy and not motivated. Spends long hours on the couch eating chips and watching the Home Shopping Network.
name: Tetris Line

description: A complex shape with a multifaceted personality.
name: Hexagon

description: The strongest shape in the game. Meditates daily to maintain equilibrium.
name: Triangle

description: Frequently confused with its sibling, Square, but insists that they are not the same shape.
name: Rectangle

description: Spreading love, friendship, and good vibes around the world.
name: Heart

description: Best friends include sun and moon, likes to stay out late at night.
name: Star

description: Frequently found in hanging with friends boxes of macaroni and cheese.
name: Arch

description: Flexible and goes with the flow. Loves to daydream.
name: Squiggle

description: A team player who dreams of being part of something bigger.
name: Z

description: A creative collaborator whose expertise is broad and deep.
name: T

description: Rather lazy, relies on friends to get the job done.
name: L

description: Does not play well with others. Likes to be the center of attention.
name: Fan Blade

description: Useful when you want to practice archery without anyone getting hurt.
name: Rounded Arrow

description: Unreliable, strings others along only to cancel last minute.
name: Bead

description: The nonconformist cousin of square and rectangle, refuses to be defined by right angles.
name: Parallelogram

description: A trailblazer who loves to help and serve others.Takes the lead in times of trouble.
name: Chevron

description: Father was a dentist and mother was an orthodontist, wore braces and headgear for ten years.
name: Crocodile

description: Will uncover what’s hidden in the darkness. Use the lantern to find spooky characters you might not otherwise be able to see.
name: Lantern

description: Represents the outside boundaries of your screen. For an example, search the community for Spider Stomp.  When the spiders touch the edge of the screen, they disappear.
name: Screen Edge
